snippet: Ms. Stravelli’s pop and jazz range was on full display as she infused joy into songs like “Midnight Sun.”
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by pop and jazz singer Gabrielle Stravelli at Feinstein’s/54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Stravelli’s pop and jazz range was on full display as she infused joy into songs like “Midnight Sun.”

headline.main: Review: Gabrielle Stravelli Gets Torchy and Intense at Feinstein’s/54 Below
headline.print_headline: Torchy and Intense About Love and Life
